name: vimagick/python Docker container
readme:
dockerfiles
===========

A collection of delicious docker recipes.

[![](https://travis-ci.org/vimagick/dockerfiles.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/vimagick/dockerfiles)

## auto-completion

```bash
#!/bin/bash
#
# handy auto-completion for docker-exec
#

enter() {
  local name=${1:?}
  docker exec -it $name sh -c 'exec $(command -v bash || command -v sh)'
}

__enter() {
  local cur=${COMP_WORDS[COMP_CWORD]}
  for cid in $(docker ps -q)
  do
    local name=$(docker inspect -f '{{.Name}}' $cid)
    name=${name#/}
    if [[ $name = $cur* ]]
    then
      COMPREPLY+=("$name")
    fi
  done
}

complete -F __enter enter
```
dockerfile:
#
# Dockerfile for python3
#

FROM alpine
MAINTAINER kev <noreply@easypi.info>

RUN set -xe \
    && apk add -U curl python3 \
    && curl -sSL https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | python3 \
    && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

CMD ["python3"]

run: set -xe     && apk add -U curl python3     && curl -sSL https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | python3     && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*
